review.comment: I have not been happy this year with my old meal prep company and started searching for something higher quality and fully customizable (searched locally for the first time). Did a small test run of 4 meals from Fit Meals 4U and have to say I am astonished. Every option I could want, organic meat choices. Hands down this is the best I have ever had and could not be happier with my first order. I look forward to using Fit Meals 4U for years to come. If in doubt? Try them, you will not be disappointed.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the amazing review. Very much appreciated. God bless and hope you have a fantastic week.

review.comment: Hands down best meal prep company. It’s local too and they have amazing meals and customer service.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the amazing review very much appreciated. Hope you had a great week. God bless.

review.comment: Food is awesome...... Personal reasons
review.review_reply: Thanks for the comment… need to ask why only 3 stars! What was not to your liking? Thank you again.

review.comment:
Everything is made Fresh. Walk right in and grab what you need. The food tastes great and is great for you. Not like other places that load their foods up with extra sauces and weird stuff. This is simple, macro friendly eating, for anyone who wants to eat health consciously

edit: They also have a military discount. Ended up ordering 14 different meals here. Each one was excellent

I found Fit Meals 4U when casually looking for ordering my dinner and thought giving it a try. I am so glad to have placed an order here. They delivered the food very quickly, it was hot, and the taste was just fantastic. I will highly recommend this place for a fulfilling and appetizing meal.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the great review.

review.comment: Wow, experience. The food quality was good. The killer taste of grill shrimp. Loved the preparation of food.

I had a positive COVID test while in Vegas for work and had to isolate in my hotel room. While the dream of living on Room Service is very real, it's not healthy or in line with my nutritional needs. I did a quick google and found FitMeals4U: if this is the team that fuels Bethany Shadburne, then this food will be quite sufficient for an elite couch athlete like myself.

My order was delivered surprisingly quickly and right on schedule, and the quality is beyond excellent, so much so that I placed a second order a few days later. I *Highly* recommend *anything* with the red sauce, and if you've never tried bison before, this is your chance. I ordered 5 days worth of food at a time, and it kept perfectly in my hotel fridge. 12/10, will order again.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the very cool review. Hope you’re feeling better. Will be seeing you again soon I’m sure. God bless.

review.comment: We ordered a 4U breakfast from FitMeals4u and the taste was good. The quantity of breakfast was excellent. I will order a mouthwatering breakfast again.
Healthy & delicious & fresh meals. Second time purchased , ordered teriyaki chicken this time was really good. Will come back next time for fitness time too :)
review.review_reply: thanks for the great review. god bless...

review.comment: A fantastic service. The food is prepared to perfection. And they deliver too.  Highly recommend this place!!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the great review. God bless..🎚🇺🇸🙏🏻
Thank you very much for the review. God bless you and the family.
Thank you very much!!!!

review.comment:
My friend Steve invited us to try the Fried Chicken at Fit Meals 4U knowing my love for "yard bird".  I've had chicken at Paula Dean's in Savannah Georgia and Harold's Chicken Shack in Chicago. I LOVE FRIED CHICKEN!
Fit Meals 4U uses no preservatives and cooks your chicken fresh when you order it. It's not greasy at all and is simply delicious. Check it out!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the awesome review. God bless.

review.comment: I just went thru a big surgery so wasn’t able to get up/walk for two weeks. I’m so glad I came across you guys. Portions are great- more than enough for each person and the family likes the food too. Thank you for so much for helping me get healthy while also relieving me of the stress having to stand/cook/grocery shop during this time which I really need to heal.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the kind words.. Happy New year and GOD BLESS YOU AND YOUR FAMILY....
thank you very much for the review.. god bless and happy new year.

review.comment: Friendly staff and great food!!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the great review. God bless and happy holidays to you and your family.

review.comment: So started coming here after a bad incident from another company that does prep meals in las vegas and have been pleased so far. The meals are quite larger and more dense then other places i tried in between. The food is pretty basic being its mainly for health however its all quality ingredients that tastegood. The attitude of the staff are on point and very relaxed, you can tell its a small business that cares about its customers and reputation.  I would recommend as its easy for in store pic up, i found the variety a little lacking for my dietary requirements however you can do custom order delivered (which most people do i just like dropping in and getting it) . make sure you sign up-to the newsletter online every week theres a discount code released approx Tuesday for 10-25% OFF  which makes the food a more competitive priced option to the rest of the prep meal services in Vegas.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the great review. God bless you and your family hope you have a great holiday.🇺🇸🦃🎚

review.comment: I called over the phone to order food for take out. Ordered 4U Breakfast and the lady said it will be ready in 15mins which seemed normal right until I pick it up. The meal was refrigerated 🎃 And it tasted weird.. can’t quite comprehend how the place has 4.9 Google maps rating. I guess Google screwed another decent application by restricting people from reviewing some places on the app itself.
review.review_reply: By this ignorant statement I’m assuming you must not know how meal prep companies work. State law requires every meal that we release to customers needs to be 41° give or take a few degrees. We are not a restaurant. So instead of contacting us and letting us know and straighten it out, you go and leave a bad review. Thank you very much have a great holiday.

review.comment: Fit Meals 4Y is DELICIOUS! Their salads are huge, & so crisp & fresh. YUM! Portions on other meals are huge. Often I can split a meal into two meals. Everything is fresh, made to order for custom meals, & prepared meals are just as delicious! Highly recommend this place. Definitely the best food prep in the LV area. Vegan, Paleo, Keto & standard meals available, staff is super friendly, & so is Joe, the owner. I have lost weight without even trying, & my blood work gets better & better, the longer I eat here.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the amazing review. Glad to be a part of your healthy life style. God bless..

review.comment: Best meal prep in vegas hands down!!!
review.review_reply: 🎚🇺🇸🍀🙏🏻much appreciated

review.comment: Fit Meals 4 U saved me during my 12 day Vegas work trip! Me and some of my co-workers ordered meals twice during our stay. Ordering was super easy, delivery was prompt and they were affordable and super delicious! It was so nice to not have to resort to fast food. We will definitely be ordering the next time we are in town putting on an event! Thank you Joe!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the very nice review. God bless hope you’re doing well.

review.comment: Amazing place 🏅🏆🌹🏵
Wonderful staff and delicous food

review.review_reply: Thank you very much.🇺🇸🙏🏻

review.comment: Best meal prep in Las Vegas! Portions are massive, & the food is so scrumptious, & FRESH!

review.comment: Absolutely love this place and the food!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the good of you. Much appreciated hope you have a great day. God bless.

review.comment: I love this place for pre-made healthy food on my fitness journey

review.comment: Been using their service for a few weeks now and the food is so good! My only concern is as I continue to use it for me and my family I’m acquiring quite a lot of tupperware. I hope in the future there will be a way to provide reuseable tupperware to decrease waste and clutter in my home
review.review_reply: 🇺🇸🙏🏻 Thank you for the great review…god bless

review.comment: BIG Yum! Just had my first order delivered and suffice to say I am sufficiently impressed with both quality and quantity! I am on a 1200 calorie diet so being able to order these delicious preset meals that are portion control and show caloric intake will make it easy. I consider this fine dining when dieting! Just had a protein muffin (only 100 cal) that was simply delicious! Achieving my weight loss goal will be doable thanks to Fit 4U. Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much….god bless

review.comment: Fantastic!  Very customizable to my protein/carb/fat requests!  Every meal tasted amazing as well.  Will use them every time im in Las Vegas!

Thank you very much for your review. Hope you guys have a great holiday merry Christmas.
This person has never been to my store or ever even placed an order.. I think this must be an error on their part hopefully she will take this down..

review.comment: Super friendly and responsive. Can't wait to enjoy Vegas without worrying about how/when to prep my meals!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much..🍀🎚🙏🏻

review.comment: I have tried so many other meal delivery services in the past, and they were all not entirely up to my standards. I tried Fit meals 4 u and they not only met my expectations, but they exceeded my expectations. Not just because of how great it taste either. Joe is very personable and delightful. Very helpful crew back there in general. Will be sticking with this company for a very long time.

review.comment: I love this place! As an entrepreneur I find it so hard to find the time to make healthy food, ever since I found this place I have been so much healthier and the food is actually amazing!

review.comment: Best meal prep company ever. Great food, good for your diet and shows up same day. Joe and Jeannie are amazing and you're plain making a mistake going anywhere else. They are the best!!!

review.comment:
Update: We have been ordering regular deliveries of delicious Fit Meals 4 u meals for close to a  year and could not be happier with the quality, choices and delivery! Blessed to have this friendly and reliable service in Las Vegas.
First review: Look no further for the most delicious fresh, healthy meals and best customer service! Some of us do not  have time to cook and shop and this is answer for nutritious and economical dining!  Have had many of the dishes and all have been great. Thank you to Joe and staff!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for the awesome review. Hope you have a great Fourth of July. Stay safe out there...🇺🇸🍀🙏🏻🎚

review.comment: We have been ordering these meals for the last 2 weeks and every meal has been fresh, filling and tasty! I thought that prepped meals would be bland and lack flavor, but I was wrong!!!   Fit meals has made eating easy!! We have busy lives and no time to cook, this has given us freedom to spend more time together and less stress over what we were going to make for dinner.  Thanks to Joe and his team!!
review.review_reply: Thank you very much...🇺🇸🙏🏻

review.comment: Best food, best value, best service of any meal prep place in Vegas!
review.review_reply: Thanks again...🍀

review.comment: I love Fitmeals4u! I haven’t had a single meal that wasn’t excellent! My favorite is probably the beef patty with brown rice, talk about a meal made just for me! The best thing is that if you have a specific diet you are on they do custom meals! The owner and the employees are always very helpful and respond to questions very quickly. If you need a “go to” meal prep place. I have no doubts that this is the place for you.

review.comment: I’ve been using their service for almost a month and I couldn’t be happier! The food is amazing and takes all of the hassle out of meal prepping. I couldn’t recommend them enough!

review.comment: Complete game changer! Great quality food at a good cost!
I love this place!! It saves me a ton of time prepping my meals and the price is great! Everyone that works there is super helpful and nice!

review.comment: This place is amazing, the food tastes great and so Many options to choose from. When I have made my first order I chose from the preset meals they had available. Then I learned that you can customize your meals and that changed everything! When you are on a specific eating plan, it’s so nice that I can choose the portions and sizes that work for my meal plan. They are also affordable and will deliver which is a plus. Thank you guys!

review.comment: Highly highly recommend!!! Cannot say enough good about this company. Great, friendly owner. Delivery process is easy. The food is by far the best of any meal prep company I have ever had. My expectations were far exceeded and I will be a continuous customer.
